item.title: Autocad-4: Trace with Autocad. FAST, CLEAN & with LOW ANCHOR POINTS.
item.author: michtintin
item.description: Plotting precise boundary line using survey coordinates. Introduction. 00:00-00:0 Hi Everyone. In this video I’m going to show you how to import an image into AutoCAD and vectorise it and export it into illustrator. Convert it into editable path in Illustrator. Import an image and fade it. 00:18-00:59 So first of all, let’s import an image or sketch into AutoCAD. We pick our drawing. JPEG or PNG is fine or even PDF would be okay.
